dct_title_s: Chartēs tēs Ēpeirou dialamvanōn en leptomereia tēn nyn horothetikēn grammēn metaxy Hellados kai Tourkias kai tas mē pragmatopoiētheisas grammas tou Kalama (Thyamidos) potamou symphōnōs me tēn Verolineion synthēkēn tou 1881
dct_description_sm: Map of Epirus showing the boundaries between Greece and Turkey according to the Treaty of Berlin. Relief shown by contours and spot heights. In upper margin: Theatron tou polemou.
dct_publisher_sm: [Athens] : G. Kasdonēs kai G. Kolman ekdotai en Athēnais, 1897 ([Athens] ek tou lithographeiou K. Groundman).
